data_table.description: The dataset provides medical history information (e.g. diagnosis coronary heart disease, diabetes, gout, metabolic syndrom x, age of diagnosis, etc.), blood test values (n=11 variables, e.g. creatinin, glucose, HbA1c, insulin, lipids, uric acid), body measurements (n=15 variables, e.g. BMI, height, waist, weight, waist-to-hip ratio, biceps and abdominal skinfold thickness), and basic socio-demographic data.

variable.name: WC
variable.description: Waist circumference at the belly button level (cm)

variable.name: SBP
variable.description: Average systolic blood pressure of 2nd and 3rd measurements (mmHg)

variable.name: DBP
variable.description: Average diastolic blood pressure 2nd and 3rd measurements (mmHg)

variable.name: HBP
variable.description: HBP (Do you have elevated blood pressure?) in original data: 1 = yes, 2 = no

variable.name: HBP_age
variable.description: HBP (Age of diagnosis) in original data

variable.name: HBP_yr
variable.description: HBP (Year of diagnosis) in original data

variable.name: CHD
variable.description: CHD (Do you have coronary heart disease?) in original data: 1 = yes, 2 = no

variable.name: CHD_age
variable.description: CHD (Age of diagnosis) in original data

variable.name: CHD_yr
variable.description: CHD (Year of diagnosis) in original data

variable.name: Diab
variable.description: Diabetes (Do you have diabetes?) in original data: 1 = yes, 2 = no

variable.name: Diab_age
variable.description: Diabetes (Age of diagnosis) in original data

variable.name: Diab_yr
variable.description: Diabetes (Year of diagnosis) in original data

variable.name: Gout
variable.description: Gout (Do you have gout?) in original data: 1 = yes, 2 = no

variable.name: Gout_age
variable.description: Gout (Age of diagnosis) in original data

variable.name: Gout_yr
variable.description: Gout (Year of diagnosis) in original data

variable.name: MedDesp
variable.description: Medications relevant for high cholesterol/triglycerides, low HDL, cardiovascular diseases, hypertension, and diabetes

variable.name: MedCode
variable.description: Treatment code: T = triglycerides, H = HDL, B = hypertension, C = cardiovascular diseases, D = diabetes

variable.name: ATP_no
variable.description: Number of abnormal MS components by Adult Treatment Panel (ATP) - III definition

variable.name: ATP
variable.description: MS by Adult Treatment Panel (ATP) - III

variable.name: IDF_no
variable.description: Number of abnormal MS components by International Diabetes Federation (IF) - 2005 definition

variable.name: Comp
variable.description: Is MS record complete? (i.e., all 5 MS component variables contain non-blank data) 1= no, 2 = yes
